summary: The diff implements the full Student Budget Manager app with backend Motoko actor and frontend React components. Most requirements are well-covered. A few specific acceptance criteria show gaps: the backend IncomeSource type uses a generic 'name: Text' rather than a typed variant (pocket_money | stipend | part_time); stable storage/canister upgrade persistence is not evidenced; deleteExpense is not shown; getDailySpendLimit backend function is not evidenced; the Digital Locker toggle in the Create Goal form does not appear to actually wire the locker activation to the goal creation call.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend income source type must be a variant: pocket_money | stipend | part_time
missing_requirements.reason: The backend IncomeSource type uses 'name: Text' (a free-form string) rather than a typed variant (pocket_money | stipend | part_time) as specified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Expense log supports delete operations per user
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows addExpense and getExpenses but no deleteExpense function is visible in the backend or frontend hooks.

missing_requirements.requirement: All state persists across canister upgrades using stable storage
missing_requirements.reason: No stable variable declarations or preupgrade/postupgrade system hooks are visible in the truncated backend code.

missing_requirements.requirement: getDailySpendLimit backend function returns spending allocation divided by days remaining in the month
missing_requirements.reason: No getDailySpendLimit function is visible in the backend diff. Daily spend limit is computed only on the frontend.

missing_requirements.requirement: Digital Locker toggle in Create Goal form activates the locker for that goal
missing_requirements.reason: The SavingsGoalTracker form includes a useLocker state and Switch toggle, but the addGoal call does not pass the locker flag â€” it only passes name, target, and deadline.

hallucinated_features.description: ProfileSetup screen requiring users to enter a display name before onboarding
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not specify a separate profile name setup step; it only specifies income onboarding. The ProfileSetup component is an extra screen not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Dark mode theme support with full dark CSS variable set
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies a student-friendly teal/green theme for mobile but does not request dark mode support.
